Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Azure SQL, Azure Storage, and Amazon S3
CurrentVersion.description: Label-based protection support is now possible for Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3 buckets, all within Microsoft Purview Information Protection. You may already know how to protect Microsoft 365 data like documents or emails with sensitivity labels, and you will now be able to apply these labels and the related protections to these additional sources. In addition, you will have a consistent framework for your sensitive information by allowing your existing label scheme and extending it to apply within these sources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will get notified about Pulse surveys they send and receive, as well as Pulse reports shared with them. Users can also create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Mobile print on Android phones
CurrentVersion.description: ,Integration of Universal Print with the Microsoft 365 mobile app will enable users to add work/school printers to their Android phones. Once the printers are installed on the phone, the user can print to them from any phone app that has a print action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices - Cancel scheduled device operations through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: If a device operation is no longer required, admins will be able to cancel scheduled device operations like, Software update and device restart, through Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy "Curated by Microsoft" content provider support
CurrentVersion.description: You can now find resources related to Copilot under the Curated by Microsoft provider. This provider will also power content for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Record opening behavior improvement in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint)
CurrentVersion.description: When a user opens a file in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint) that has a retention label managing the file as a locked record, it will now open as read-only and immediately not allow any user edits. A message will explain to the user why they cannot edit the file. This improvement brings parity to the behavior already in place for the online versions of these Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: File Image preview in chats and channels
CurrentVersion.description: When you share documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDF) in chat or channel conversation, you can see a thumbnail image of the file in the thread. This lets you preview the file’s content without opening it and find the file you need quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
CurrentVersion.description: ,Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution.  Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) per location or region so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any printer at that location or region, depending on the setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security protection controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplifying the personal app header
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams personal apps will start showing a new simplified header bar on Microsoft Teams desktop and web clients. With this change, the "About" tab and other utility actions will be moved to the overflow menu. In addition, the "Chat" tab will be moved to a right-hand side panel for apps that support it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Mute user for network
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, Engage admins can remove specific users' posts from the Engage home feed, storylines feed, and all email digests. Selected users are not notified about this change. 
Engage admins may find this feature helps to moderate the visibility of content in the network. Mute user for network is part of a suite of moderation features in Engage, including view-only mode, close conversations, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Excel: Extending support for Insights Services to GCC sovereign cloud
CurrentVersion.description: GCC sovereign cloud customers will be able to use features in Excel run by Insights Services, including Analyze Data found on the Home tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Create goals from multiple M365 documents with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users will be able to add more than one file from Context IQ suggestions as references in their prompts to Copilot for generating goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Clipchamp for Education (A3 & A5)
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web or Windows app for Microsoft 365 A3 and Microsoft 365 A5 SKUs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Viva –  Microsoft Copilot Dashboard in Viva Insights Product Updates
CurrentVersion.description: Adding trendlines to show metric movements over past 6-month time periods, before vs after Copilot comparisons, and providing the option to view an estimated dollar value for the existing Copilot assisted hours metric.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Custom backgrounds in Teams admin center for Teams Rooms on Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set images as custom themes in the Teams admin center for Teams devices, allowing images that reflect their organization's branding. The feature will first launch for Teams Rooms on Android devices and then gradually release for other device types.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat Bubbles during Teams meetings for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to view chats sent during a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room, calling attention to the chat conversation happening alongside the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat Bubbles during Teams meetings for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: Ability to view chats sent during a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room, calling attention to the chat conversation happening alongside the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Honor Tenant admin control settings for Microsoft Bookings SMS functionality in the Bookings app in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant admin settings in Bookings admin page in Microsoft Teams Admin center to enable/disable SMS functionality in all Bookings calendars in the tenant. Note: The cloud environments have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Honor Tenant admin control settings for Microsoft Bookings SMS functionality in the Bookings app in Teams
OldVersion.description: Tenant admin settings in Bookings admin page in Microsoft Teams Admin center to enable/disable SMS functionality in all Bookings calendars in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Support for adaptive policy scopes
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adaptive policy scopes enable your organization to define user scopes for policies based on criteria such as geography, group, or other Azure Active Directory attributes. With adaptive policy scopes, policies are automatically updated to include users that match defined risk criteria rather than requiring admins to repeatedly update static lists of users to include in the policy scope. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC and FINRA obligations), such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language and sharing of adult content. Communication Compliance enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Support for adaptive policy scopes
OldVersion.description: ,Adaptive policy scopes enable your organization to define user scopes for policies based on criteria such as geography, group, or other Azure Active Directory attributes. With adaptive policy scopes, policies are automatically updated to include users that match defined risk criteria rather than requiring admins to repeatedly update static lists of users to include in the policy scope. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC and FINRA obligations), such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language and sharing of adult content. Communication Compliance enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
OldVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Ability to exclude bulk emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Communication Compliance policies will allow filtering of bulk emails such as newsletters to help customers triage policy matches more efficiently. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Templates in Planner web
CurrentVersion.description: Get started quickly by using a pre-made template to jump into your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Compliant Team Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance policies can be configured to analyze Microsoft Teams meeting transcripts for potential policy matches. Teams meeting transcripts are only generated when meeting organizers opt in to meeting recording. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA) and business conduct violations, such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive/confidential information, adult content, and using harassing or threatening language. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase and adding additional cloud instances to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional Timeline Zoom Options
CurrentVersion.description: Four new options to the zoom feature in the Timeline view will enable you to view your long-term projects at 18 months and 2, 3, and 6 years.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9 videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting participants time-zone
CurrentVersion.description: When scheduling a meeting with people from different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone, ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Plan sharing with file container
CurrentVersion.description: A new authorization model is implemented for Planner plans, which will be a ‘shared container-based’ authorization model, where OneDrive and SharePoint Online files can be linked to plans to provide users with access to the plan if they have access to the shared container. This means that file-based authorization for plans will provide streamlined access to roster-backed plans that are connected to one or more SharePoint Online/OneDrive files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set: Advanced filters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Updates to eDiscovery (Premium) review filters experience that allow admins to construct compound nested filters with either “AND” or “OR” conditions, go back and forth (undo/redo) between different iterations of filters, manage saved filter queries without navigating to a different panel, and use “Is empty/Is not empty” condition for each filter.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
CurrentVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: New out-of-the-box templates
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly create a project from an assortment of new out-of-the box templates including a project retrospective template, a goals template and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set data minimization - Identify exact duplicates by default
CurrentVersion.description: ,Harness the built-in review set query within eDiscovery (Premium) review sets, specifically designed to pinpoint exact duplicates and encompassing email threads, to systematically reduce your review set data by an average of 30%, eliminating the need to trigger analytics manually post ingestion. Gain full visibility into all hash values utilized in de-duplication and email threading algorithms, ensuring a seamless and efficient review process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
CurrentVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Loop: Workspace Links
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly request access to a workspace by clicking on a Workspace Link.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Loop: Copilot-assisted Loop Page Creation
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborate with Copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click, you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the view menu in Teams meetings. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to customize surveys & team conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now offers the capability to personalize surveys and team conversations. Additionally, users can customize their logo and sender domain.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Join Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Lead-Lag in task dependencies
CurrentVersion.description: Set advancement and delay between tasks in your project.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint. The status has been adjusted to correctly reflect the current status of this feature. We apologize for any confusion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Adaptive policy scope
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive policy scopes enable your organization to create scopes that automatically updates which users to include in your policy based on geography, group, or another user attribute. The policy will automatically update to match the criteria defined in the scope instead of you constantly needing to update the static list of users in your policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Advanced Tenant Rename
CurrentVersion.description: As part of SharePoint Advanced Management, change your SharePoint domain with greater control. This includes the ability to prioritize up to 4,000 sites for early execution as well as support for tenants with total site counts up to 100,000.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Phone and Teams Rooms licenses in device store
CurrentVersion.description: IT administrators can already browse and purchase Teams certified devices in the device store in Teams Admin Center. This update will enable IT admins to try and buy Teams Phone and Teams Rooms licenses from the device store.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description: With the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Teams meeting templates added to Outlook Teams add-in
CurrentVersion.description: New meeting templates for Virtual Appointment, Webinar, and Town hall are available in the Teams meeting dropdown menu in the Calendar tab in Outlook with the Outlook Teams add-in enabled. This allows organizers to set up these broader Teams meeting scenarios directly within Outlook and these will show up on calendars in both Outlook and Teams apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. Note: We have updated the clouds to reflect the current state. Gov clouds will be forthcoming later during Q4 of this calendar year.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Copilot in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Open and Edit Projects in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Manage your projects along with plans and to-do lists in one simple, familiar experience within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Create personal plans in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Create personal plans in the new Planner app for Teams. For these types of plans, the creator of the plan is the only member and owner.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Auto population of due tasks in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: In the Planner Teams app, your tasks will automatically appear in My Day on their due dates. This will help you stay on top of your priorities and stay organized throughout the day.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Manage all your tasks in My Tasks
CurrentVersion.description: My Tasks within the Planner Teams app shows your tasks across plans, projects, to-do lists and flagged emails so you can quickly triage and track all the work on your plate.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Access all your plans, projects and to do lists in My Plans
CurrentVersion.description: My Plans within the Planner app in Teams brings together all of your plans, projects and to do lists to help you easily discover and find all your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Admin policy for enabling/disabling tenant users to join externally hosted meetings
CurrentVersion.description: As an admin, you can control which meetings your org users can attend - only internally hosted meetings or externally hosted meetings as well. This can help your org to meet compliance needs and strengthen controls around Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide general channel
CurrentVersion.description: Alike other channels, now you will be able to hide general channels in your teams, helping you focus on the channels that matter most to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private & shared channels links
CurrentVersion.description: Need to add your colleague to a channel discussion? Copy the link of a private or a shared channel, a channel post or one of its replies and share it with your partner, so they can join the discussion in one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Request to join a shared channel via channel link
CurrentVersion.description: Users who attempt to access a shared channel via a link can request to join the channel. Channel owners will receive the join request and can decide to approve or deny request.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Request to join a shared channel via channel link
CurrentVersion.description: Users who attempt to access a shared channel via a link can request to join the channel. Channel owners will receive the join request and can decide to approve or deny request.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manage Graph providers in Admin tab
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable admins to manage graph providers in Admin tab such as adding permission, deleting providers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Prevent user from sharing content in externally hosted meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If a user attends a meeting hosted by an external tenant, the IT admin of the person attending the externally hosted meeting can decide in which externally hosted meetings the user can share their content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting invite improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting invite is the first thing that the user invited to the meeting sees before joining. We are making some design improvements to make sure we have the most important information there and it's better grouped. Note: We have updated the cloud environments to reflect the current state.  Other government clouds will release at a later time. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a webinar are now accessible within the webinar setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): File reference - PDF file type support
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability for users to reference PDF files when generating content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Support for Content camera on new Teams app experience for Windows and Mac. Content camera enables remote attendees to get a clear view of physical objects like whiteboards, printed documents, books, and more that are in a meeting room. Content camera intelligently detects, crops and frames the in-room object and shares its content with remote meeting participants. Even when a presenter moves in front of it, for example the whiteboard, remote participants will be able to see the content right through them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (i.e. Bing, Edge, Windows, copilot.microsoft.com, and Copilot mobile app). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90 or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Custom image as Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint lets you customize the sections backgrounds with your own image. We've enhanced the focal point and introduced more settings like fill mode, overlay, opacity to help you adhere to accessibility best practices and make sure that your contents are clear and readable with customized background. This gives you more power over the image to make your page beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component. Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file to meet the requirements of the case.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Give feedback for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Help button includes a Give feedback option that lets users share their opinions and ideas about Teams Rooms with Microsoft. We use this feedback to improve the Teams experience. IT admins can enable or disable this feature for users and manage feedback policies using PowerShell.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a town hall are now accessible within the town hall setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document rather than operating on the entire document.  This is being removed from the roadmap as a duplicate of Roadmap ID 389851.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Import schedule improvements in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline managers importing a schedule from Excel into Shifts will be capable of viewing the import history of their teams. This allows them to monitor the status and outcome of their import at anytime.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External domain activity report export capability
CurrentVersion.description: Export the ‘External domain activity’ report to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Developers can now build Microsoft Teams apps with Outlook add-ins as extension element
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can now build and publish Teams apps with Outlook add-ins for use by their customers. Users can acquire these Teams apps with Outlook add-in for themselves via Outlook on the web, new Outlook for Windows, and classic Outlook for Windows clients. Admins can deploy to users from Integrated Apps in Microsoft 365 Admin Center. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enable/Disable Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to enable or disable the entire Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing services.  Disabling the service prevents any models of this type from running.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to Viva App Bar
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint displays Viva App Bar for improved discoverability of other Viva Apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
CurrentVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New "Categorized email" and "Mail from specific people" search folders will be supported in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Search folders are virtual folders that provide a view of all email items that match specific search criteria. We will introduce two new Search Folders: Categorized email search folders let you easily filter emails by assigned categories enhancing inbox organization. Mail from specific people search folders let you automatically collect and organize emails from designated senders or contacts. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New "Categorized email" and "Mail from specific people" search folders will be supported in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Search folders are virtual folders that provide a view of all email items that match specific search criteria. We will introduce two new Search Folders: Categorized email search folders let you easily filter emails by assigned categories enhancing inbox organization. Mail from specific people search folders let you automatically collect and organize emails from designated senders or contacts. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Work account support in Clipchamp's desktop app
CurrentVersion.description:
The updated Clipchamp desktop app introduces work account support and lets users with AAD/Entra ID accounts directly access Clipchamp for work through the desktop app for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Users of Clipchamp for work will be able to access the video editor in the app without using a browser. Microsoft 365 administrators can control if their users are able to access both Clipchamp for work and Clipchamp for personal accounts via the app or only Clipchamp for work.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/topic/how-to-enable-or-disable-clipchamp-for-users-in-your-organization-5b74028f-6dd8-423c-a6cb-8e2b8b42c6e7#bkmk_app_access

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot integration with the file viewer in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive will soon be available from the file viewer in Microsoft 365 for customers with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license. Clicking on the Copilot icon in the file viewer will open the Copilot chat panel which will allow you to summarize or get information from your files in OneDrive or SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Planned release of AI insights
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are planning to provide an LLM-powered data analysis tools that admins can use to gain insights and actions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling call forwarding directly from phone device home screen through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Users can enable call forwarding directly from phone device home screen (including common area phones). Admins can control display of call forwarding on phone device home screen through Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Files Card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: The feature helps organizations add a view of files which were recently accessed, shared or marked favorite by the user. This file view can be added in the form of card on Viva Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: ,Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted and FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder tags on items in Search Folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search Folders will now display a folder tag within the message list, indicating the folder to which each email belongs. This enhancement provides users with quick and easy access to contextual information, improving navigation and organization within their mailbox. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Managed device attestation for iOS/iPadOS and macOS device enrollment and ADE
CurrentVersion.description: Intune is bringing ACME and managed device attestation support for eligible Apple devices to GA. This includes device enrollment and ADE enrollments, including AC2. This applies to new enrollments with device enrollment (BYOD) and new enrollments with ADE or Apple Configurator tool.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Apps now supported in group chats with external users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now access applications in group chats with individuals outside their organization, fostering improved collaboration, interactivity, and productivity. The group chat’s host involving external participants can install, remove, or update applications for use by all members.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent call recap (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The Calls app in Teams will soon have AI-generated notes and action items from your calls, so you can pay attention to your conversations and save time coordinating next steps. Intelligent call recap will work for both VoIP and PSTN calls, and summaries will be generated from calls for which transcription was enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: DLP will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. On inspection, all the files (of supported file format) within the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies. Afterwards, the archive file will get the applicable auditing / enforcement policy applied to it based on the following logic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management for app deployment in Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: App centric management for app deployment will introduce a new admin setting to control who in the tenant has specific Teams apps preinstalled. Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Azure SQL, Azure Storage, and Amazon S3
CurrentVersion.description: Label-based protection support is now possible for Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3 buckets, all within Microsoft Purview Information Protection. You may already know how to protect Microsoft 365 data like documents or emails with sensitivity labels, and you will now be able to apply these labels and the related protections to these additional sources. In addition, you will have a consistent framework for your sensitive information by allowing your existing label scheme and extending it to apply within these sources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Mobile print on Android phones
CurrentVersion.description: ,Integration of Universal Print with the Microsoft 365 mobile app will enable users to add work/school printers to their Android phones. Once the printers are installed on the phone, the user can print to them from any phone app that has a print action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices - Cancel scheduled device operations through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: If a device operation is no longer required, admins will be able to cancel scheduled device operations like, Software update and device restart, through Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy "Curated by Microsoft" content provider support
CurrentVersion.description: You can now find resources related to Copilot under the Curated by Microsoft provider. This provider will also power content for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Record opening behavior improvement in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint)
CurrentVersion.description: When a user opens a file in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint) that has a retention label managing the file as a locked record, it will now open as read-only and immediately not allow any user edits. A message will explain to the user why they cannot edit the file. This improvement brings parity to the behavior already in place for the online versions of these Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: File Image preview in chats and channels.
CurrentVersion.description: When you share documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDF) in chat or channel conversation, you can see a thumbnail image of the file in the thread. This lets you preview the file’s content without opening it and find the file you need quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: File Image preview in chats and channels
CurrentVersion.description: When you share documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDF) in chat or channel conversation, you can see a thumbnail image of the file in the thread. This lets you preview the file’s content without opening it and find the file you need quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
CurrentVersion.description: ,Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution.  Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) per location or region so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any printer at that location or region, depending on the setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security protection controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplifying the personal app header
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams personal apps will start showing a new simplified header bar on Microsoft Teams desktop and web clients. With this change, the "About" tab and other utility actions will be moved to the overflow menu. In addition, the "Chat" tab will be moved to a right-hand side panel for apps that support it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Mute user for network
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, Engage admins can remove specific users' posts from the Engage home feed, storylines feed, and all email digests. Selected users are not notified about this change. 
Engage admins may find this feature helps to moderate the visibility of content in the network. Mute user for network is part of a suite of moderation features in Engage, including view-only mode, close conversations, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Excel: Extending support for Insights Services to GCC sovereign cloud
CurrentVersion.description: GCC sovereign cloud customers will be able to use features in Excel run by Insights Services, including Analyze Data found on the Home tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Create goals from multiple M365 documents with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users will be able to add more than one file from Context IQ suggestions as references in their prompts to Copilot for generating goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Clipchamp for Education (A3 & A5)
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web or Windows app for Microsoft 365 A3 and Microsoft 365 A5 SKUs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Viva –  Microsoft Copilot Dashboard in Viva Insights Product Updates
CurrentVersion.description: Adding trendlines to show metric movements over past 6-month time periods, before vs after Copilot comparisons, and providing the option to view an estimated dollar value for the existing Copilot assisted hours metric.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Custom backgrounds in Teams admin center for Teams Rooms on Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set images as custom themes in the Teams admin center for Teams devices, allowing images that reflect their organization's branding. The feature will first launch for Teams Rooms on Android devices and then gradually release for other device types.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat Bubbles during Teams meetings for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to view chats sent during a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room, calling attention to the chat conversation happening alongside the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Honor Tenant admin control settings for Microsoft Bookings SMS functionality in the Bookings app in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant admin settings in Bookings admin page in Microsoft Teams Admin center to enable/disable SMS functionality in all Bookings calendars in the tenant. Note: The cloud environments have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Support for adaptive policy scopes
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adaptive policy scopes enable your organization to define user scopes for policies based on criteria such as geography, group, or other Azure Active Directory attributes. With adaptive policy scopes, policies are automatically updated to include users that match defined risk criteria rather than requiring admins to repeatedly update static lists of users to include in the policy scope. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC and FINRA obligations), such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language and sharing of adult content. Communication Compliance enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.
